user.description:
Connect your Bring! account to sync your shopping lists with Home Assistant.

Don't have a Bring! account? Download the app on [Google Play for Android]({google_play}) or the [App Store for iOS]({app_store}) to sign up.
user.title: Bring! Grocery shopping list

notify_missing_argument.message: This action requires field {field}, please enter a valid value for {field}

notify_request_failed.message: Failed to send push notification for Bring! due to a connection error, try again later

setup_parse_exception.message: Failed to parse server response, try again later

setup_request_exception.message: Failed to connect to server, try again later

todo_delete_item_failed.message: Failed to delete {count} item(s) from Bring! list

options.changed_list: I changed the list! - Take a look at the items
options.going_shopping: I'm going shopping! - Last chance for adjustments
options.shopping_done: The shopping is done - Our fridge is well stocked
options.urgent_message: Attention! Attention! - We still urgently need: [Items]

send_message.description: Sends a mobile push notification to members of a shared Bring! list.

entity_id.description: Bring! list whose members (except sender) will be notified.
entity_id.name: List

item.description: Item name(s) to include in an urgent message e.g. 'Attention! Attention! - We still urgently need: [Items]'
item.name: Item (Required if notification type 'Urgent message' is selected)

message.description: Type of push notification to send to list members.
message.name: Notification type

send_message.name: Send a notification
